text.speaker: narrator
text.message: The road seems more frequented here. The dirt path opens up to a rickety old building.

text.speaker: narrator
text.message: The words 'The Last Drop' hangs on by a single nail, threatening to fall at any time.

text.speaker: friend
text.message: I'm dying for a drink, come'on let's go.

text.speaker: friend
text.message: Can anyone cover me? I'd really love a drink.

text.speaker: narrator
text.message: Your friends quickly rush you into the bar, you grab a seat while they head out in search of drinks.

Which potion should you drink?
 > Potion 1
 > Potion 2
 > Potion 3

partials.72eec2a9a1bd0f70658f693a91ae533fa8991315: I'm really not craving oreos right now...
partials.2d9a0c4a041ba8dd5b4089e58d8696fa3b480c20: Do I look like I want a pocky??
partials.a7e4962f7840041e875590a60ca84b4a72add0af: I don't like peanut butter flavoured things.

text.answer_response: Congrats, you get to live another day.

text.speaker: narrator
text.message: You find your remaining two friends trapped in a ghost sphere in the back.

text.speaker: narrator
text.message: You decide to set out for the Fields of Valour immediately to beat your traitor to the treasure.
